price: Allah’ın tuzağından emin mi oldular? Allah’ın tuzağından hüsrana uğramış toplumdan başkası asla emin olmaz.
arabic: أَفَأَمِنُواْ مَكۡرَ ٱللَّهِۚ فَلَا يَأۡمَنُ مَكۡرَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلۡقَوۡمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: afa-aminū makra al-lahi falā yamanu makra al-lahi illā al-qawmu al-khāsirūna
